title: Handle minimum terminal size gracefully
description:
Add minimum size handling:

Minimum dimensions:
- Width: 60 characters
- Height: 12 rows

When below minimum:
1. Show warning message instead of TUI:
   'Terminal too small. Minimum: 60x12, Current: {w}x{h}'
   'Please resize your terminal.'

2. Set m.ready = false when below minimum
3. Re-check on each WindowSizeMsg
4. Return to normal TUI when size adequate

Implementation in View():
if m.width < 60 || m.height < 12 {
    return renderSizeWarning(m.width, m.height)
}

Center the warning message in available space.
Use warning color (orange) for the message.
